column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat exceeded all my expectations! Great and friendly service
column2: food & drinks were delicious Â and the place was very well laid out and the decor was impressive! Welcome to Houston Bosscat Kitchen+Libations! We will definitely be returning!!! P.S. Jeremy was our waiter when we went and he provided us with great service Even though it was a busy night.
